nodes.bodyText: Why customize the styles for the button and tooltip?
I wanted to override the material-ui  styling to emphasize the currently selected button.

I asked because I'm concerned about the one-off styling. Material UI has a ToggleButton in the lab https://material-ui.com/components/toggle-button/ but I don't know that we want to add the lab (yet). Is it worth adding a component for this?
I've considered that alternative as well but decided against it since 1) we currently do not have @material-ui/lab and 2) even if we add ToggleButton we may need to add additional stylings.
Can we get this from theme.palette? (It looks like theme.palette.primary.main)
See previous comment about getting this from theme.palette
can we use config.hasOwnProperty here instead? Same for line 95
nit: consolidate these into a single class

It has to be height excluding header instead of footer, since JSON action buttons are located in live viewer component.
Changed it to height: 'calc(100vh - 48px)', // height excluding header
Resolved.
